name: Oh Satan, I gotta hide
description:
The props have gone wild, hunt all of them down to win.
This is a typical Prop hunt made by a small group of students.
You either become a hunter or a prop.
As a hunter, your job is to search the level to find all the props within the timelimit. worry not, the more props you kill the more hunters will join you in the hunt.
As a prop, your job is to hide as an objekt. anywhere is allowed but will your friends like it? That we wont know. want to annoy your friends? good, good. We have a taunt button just for that.
hope you will enjoy our little school project.
